::FireBlade::
FireBlade sat and watched the ship jsut waiting for one little gunshot
to attack....



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Autofire::
>
> Autofire looks over at Rippersnapper. He didn't feel like arguing
> pointlessly, so he just looks back in the direction of the CF and
> waits for Megatron's signal.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > ::Rippersnapper::
> > He considers Autofire's words, and locks in on the bot's position.
> > He soon arrives at Autofire's location. "Me don't like waiting..."
> He
> > grumbles, mainly to himself.
